job_title: Aerospace Systems Engineer II - Chantilly, VA
job_description:
• Work closely with customers to understand their system-level engineering requirements, analyze solutions using Ansys DME products (STK, ODTK, etc.
• Support product development by translating customer feedback into new features, assist in designing feature implementation requirements, and testing product releases on real-world problems.
• Minimum of 2 years of professional experience in an engineering software environment.
• Hands-on experience with Ansys software or other engineering tools (mission simulation (STK, ODTK), MSBE, optimization, CAD).
• Strong organizational and time management skills, with the ability to manage multiple priorities.
• Shape future product features and innovations by translating customer needs into actionable feedback for development teams.
• Exceptional interpersonal and communication skills, fluent in written and spoken English.
